Name: VIN
Definition / Notes: Recommended operating range from datasheet ROC table
Comments: Also see Absolute Maximum Ratings: -0.3 V to 6.5 V

Name: VOUT
Definition / Notes: Nominal output voltage range from datasheet ROC table
Comments: VOUT abs max limited to min(6.5 V, VIN + 0.3 V)

Name: EN
Comments: Internal 500 kÎ© pulldown to GND when VEN < VEN(HI)

Name: GND
Comments: Kelvin return handled later in Step 7 (layout)

Name: Package type
Definition / Notes: Selected small-outline DSBGA for area-driven LDO

Name: Usable die area
Definition / Notes: 80% of package area used as first-pass die-area budget

Name: PDK node
Definition / Notes: Assumed automotive-capable BCD process with precision poly + MIM caps
Comments: 130 nm BCD with Hi-Res poly and MIM capacitors

Name: Thermal resistance RÎ¸JA
Definition / Notes: From datasheet thermal table for DSBGA package
Comments: Use this for first-pass junction temperature estimates

Name: Decision Box 0
Definition / Notes: Are all external pins and pad connections defined and mapped to the PDK pad library?
Comments: If No: complete pin list or ESD targets. If Yes: proceed to Step 1.
